findings.title: Amazon SageMaker notebook instances should not have direct internet access
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: EC2 instances should be managed by AWS Systems Manager
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: EC2 instances managed by Systems Manager should have an association compliance status of COMPLIANT
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: EC2 instances managed by Systems Manager should have a patch compliance status of COMPLIANT after a patch installation
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: S3 general purpose buckets should have block public access settings enabled
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: S3 general purpose buckets should require requests to use SSL
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: S3 general purpose buckets should use cross-Region replication
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: S3 general purpose buckets should block public read access
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: S3 general purpose buckets should block public write access
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: Amazon Redshift clusters should prohibit public access
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: RDS DB Instances should prohibit public access, as determined by the PubliclyAccessible configuration
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: RDS snapshot should be private
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: OpenSearch domains should have encryption at rest enabled
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: OpenSearch domains should not be publicly accessible
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: Lambda functions should be in a VPC
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: Lambda function policies should prohibit public access
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: AWS KMS key rotation should be enabled
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: Password policies for IAM users should have strong configurations
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: Unused IAM user credentials should be removed
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.

findings.title: MFA should be enabled for all IAM users
findings.remediation_steps: Refer to AWS Security Hub documentation.
